name: Save the Doggy
description:
Welcome to Save the Dog - Brain Puzzle Game. Draw lines to prevent bees from hurting doge. Game play is easy but not boring.

How to Play:
1. Touch the screen to draw a line to protect the doge from being hurt by bees.
2. Release your finger after building a safe wall.
3. The bees in the hive try to attack the doge.
4. Prevent the dog from being hurt by bees for 10 seconds.
5. Pass the level and win huge rewards.

Save the Dog - Brain Puzzle Game highlight:
1. Many puzzle and interesting levels.
2. Cute and comfortable game effects
3. Fun and relaxing game play
4. Offline mode available and no wifi connection is required
5. Amazing spare time killer.
6. A variety of customized clearance methods;

So what are you waiting for? Get ready for a new seek game, dog game, pet rescue, save animal game right now. Hopefully, This Dog Game will make your day become more interesting and colorful.
